<->( about )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

In Ninja Reflex from Nunchuck Games you can Master the 
Art of Speed and become a Ninja Gamer!?...

Ninja Reflex uses martial arts challenges to test your reflexes,
sharpen your hand-eye coordination, and measure your
reaction times to the millisecond.

Wield throwing stars, katanas, nunchucks?even chopsticks!
Progress from White Belt all the way to Black Belt, 3rd Degree,
and see if you can complete the 50+ Steam achievements on 
your journey!.

* 300 Ninja challenges to conquer.
* Go from White Belt to Black Belt, 3rd Degree.
* 50+ Steam achievements to complete.
* Compete in local multiplayer battles with up to 4 players.
* Receive authentic martial arts wisdom from your Sensei.
* Create a Ninja Name from over 25,000 possibilities.
* Learn to Meditate to achieve greater mental focus.
* Find all the Half-Life and Portal Easter Eggs!
  

<->( Hardware Requirements )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

enuff


<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1.: Unrar with WinRar ( newest! ) ... or use 7zip.

2.: double click: Ninja-Launcher.exe ( must be done )

3.: double click: makedesktopIcon.exe and run game with.

<->( Special Info )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed .exe file , in this

case its the file > Ninja-Launcher.exe < as a lame virus, because its  

the byte by byte check error of some virustools!. ( h e u r i s t i c s  ) but... 

Its almost certainly a false positive alert from overly protective heuristics,

you can read more about in your VirusTool-Manual or VirusTools-WebSite!.

(heuristics). you can also upload the file to certain websites to let them test.

with this result...> a false positive alert from... < if you dont believe , then

simply stay away, and dont come up with nonsense. thank you for reading!.
